properties.name: couponType
properties.description: Either product (valid for specified products or subscription plans) or checkout (valid for any checkout)

properties.name: productIds
properties.description: Comma-separated list of product IDs. Required if coupon_type is product. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: discountType
properties.description: Either flat or percentage

properties.name: discountAmount
properties.description: Discount amount in currency

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: Attributes in JSON form

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Number of times a coupon can be used in a checkout. This will be set to 999,999 by default, if not specified.

properties.name: couponCode
properties.description: Will be randomly generated if not specified

properties.name: couponPrefix
properties.description: Prefix for generated codes. Not valid if coupon_code is specified.

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of the coupon. This will be displayed in the Seller Dashboard.

properties.name: expires
properties.description: The coupon will expire on the date at 00:00:00 UTC

properties.name: group
properties.description: The name of the coupon group this coupon should be assigned to

properties.name: numberOfCoupons
properties.description: Number of coupons to generate. Not valid if coupon_code is specified.

properties.name: recurring
properties.description: If the coupon is used on subscription products, this indicates whether the discount should apply to recurring payments after the initial purchase

properties.name: productId
properties.description: The specific product/subscription ID

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: discount
properties.description: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account

properties.name: newCouponCode
properties.description: New code to rename the coupon to

properties.name: newGroup
properties.description: New group name to move coupon to

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a coupon

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many coupons

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a coupon

properties.name: to
properties.description: Payment up until date

properties.name: isPaid
properties.description: Whether payment is paid

properties.name: plan
properties.description: Filter: The product/plan ID (single or comma-separated values)

properties.name: subscriptionId
properties.description: A specific user subscription ID

properties.name: state
properties.description: Filter: The user subscription status. Returns all active, past_due, trialing and paused subscription plans if not specified.

properties.name: paymentId
properties.description: The upcoming subscription payment ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: date
properties.description: Date you want to move the payment to

properties.name: Reschedule
properties.description: Reschedule payment

properties.name: planId
properties.description: Filter: The subscription plan ID

properties.name: checkoutId
properties.description: The identifier of the buyerâ€™s checkout
